name: Mac & Cheese
description: Creamy cheddar cheese mixed with perfectly cooked macaroni, topped with cripsy breadcrumbs. A classic comfort food.

name: Margherita Pizza
description: A classic pizza with fresh mozzarella, tomatoes, and basil on a thin and crispy crust.

name: Caesar Salad
description: Romaine lettuce tossed in Caeser dressing, topped with croutons and parmesan shawlings.

name: Spaghetti Carbonara
description: Al dente spaghetti with a creamy sauce made from egg yolk, pecerino cheese.

name: Veggie Burger
description: A juicy veggie patty served on a whole grain bun with lettuce tomato, and a tangy.

name: Grilled Chicken Sandwich
description: Tender grilled chicken breast with avocado, bacon, lettuce, and honey mustard on a.

name: Steak Frites
description: Succulent steak cooked to your preference, served with crispy golden fries and herb butter.

name: Sushi Roll Platter
description: An assortment of fresh sushi rolls including California Spicy Tuna, and Eel Avocado.

name: Chicken Curry
description: Tender pieces of chicken simmered in a rich and aromatic curry sauce, served with basmati rice.

name: Vegan Buddha Bowl
description: A hearty bowl filled with quinea, roasted veggies, avocado, and a tahini dressing.

name: Seafood Paella
description: A Spanish delicacy filled with saffron-infused rice, shrimp, mussels, and cherizo.

name: Pancake Stack
description: Fluffy pancakes stacked high, drizzled with maple syrup and topped with fresh berries.
